actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to create a Department of the Treasury Forfeiture Fund.
short_title: Department of the Treasury Forfeiture Fund Act

summary.text: Department of the Treasury Forfeiture Fund Act - Amends Federal law to establish the Department of the Treasury Forfeiture Fund for the deposit of proceeds from assets seized and forfeited for violations of Treasury laws. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to make funds available to the U.S. Coast Guard from such Fund for its seizure and law enforcement activities. Authorizes appropriations as necessary to administer such Fund. Sets forth the authorities of the Secretary with respect to forfeited property.

titles.title: Department of the Treasury Forfeiture Fund Act
A bill to create a Department of the Treasury Forfeiture Fund.
